title: What types of sunglasses do you offer?
text: We offer a wide variety of sunglasses, including classic, sporty, vintage, polarized, and eco-friendly styles.

title: Do your sunglasses offer UV protection?
text: Yes, all our sunglasses come with 100% UV protection to keep your eyes safe from harmful UVA and UVB rays.

title: What is your return policy?
text: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If youâ€™re not satisfied with your purchase, simply return the sunglasses within 30 days for a full refund or exchange.

title: Do you offer international shipping?
text: Yes, we ship worldwide! Shipping times and costs vary by location.

title: How do I care for my sunglasses?
text: We recommend cleaning your sunglasses with a microfiber cloth and storing them in the provided case when not in use.
